de:
Between Sarlat and Domme, overlooking the Dordogne and located at the centre of some of the best-known castles, le Clos Roussillon is nestled in a verdant sanctuary.

This is a haven of peace and tranquillity where the sweet life awaits you!
 
Recently renovated in order to create a very comfortable and welcoming hotel, ideal for relaxation. Our air conditioned rooms and our studios with private terrace enjoy a spectacular view of the bastide of Domme. You will also love our beautiful heated swimming pool, park, panoramic terrace, bar and private parking.
As if this were not enough, the hotel is a home base for your discovery of the rich culture of the region.
en: 6km from Sarlat, nestled in a lush environment overlooking the river Dordogne. Quiet, modern and comfortable. bedrooms and studios with private terrace with a view on the bastide village of Domme. Big park, outdoor heated swimming pool, panoramic terrace. Non smoking. LCD TV, children play area.
it: a 6 km da Sarlat, immerso nel verde, con vista sul fiume Dordogna. Hotel tranquillo, moderno e confortevole. Camere e monolocali con terrazza privata, vista su Domme. Ampio parco, piscina esterna riscaldata, terrazza panoramica. Non fumatori, TV LCD, giochi per bambini.
fr: 6km de Sarlat, niché dans un écrin de verdure, dominant la rivière Dordogne. Hôtel au calme, moderne et confortable. Chambres et studios avec terrasse privative,  vue sur Domme. Grand parc, piscine extérieure chauffée, terrasse panoramique. Non fumeur, TV LCD, jeux enfants.

hasBeenCreatedBy.schema:legalName: Office de Tourisme Sarlat Périgord Noir

de: Collecter, mettre en commun et diffuser le plus largement possible une information complète et de qualité au service de nos habitants et de nos visiteurs : voici les objectifs du SIRTAQUI, Système d’Information Régional Touristique de Nouvelle-AQUItaine. Le dispositif est mis en œuvre conjointement par le Comité Régional de Tourisme de Nouvelle-Aquitaine, les services touristiques de la Corrèze, de la Creuse, de la Dordogne, de la Gironde, des Landes, du Lot-et-Garonne, des Pyrénées-Atlantiques, des Deux-Sèvres, de la Vienne et de la Haute-Vienne, en collaboration avec les Offices de Tourisme, et avec le soutien financier de l’Europe et du Conseil Régional.

de:
Between Sarlat and Domme, overlooking the Dordogne and located at the centre of some of the best-known castles, le Clos Roussillon is nestled in a verdant sanctuary.

This is a haven of peace and tranquillity where the sweet life awaits you!
 
Recently renovated in order to create a very comfortable and welcoming hotel, ideal for relaxation. Our air conditioned rooms and our studios with private terrace enjoy a spectacular view of the bastide of Domme. You will also love our beautiful heated swimming pool, park, panoramic terrace, bar and private parking.
As if this were not enough, the hotel is a home base for your discovery of the rich culture of the region.
en: 6km from Sarlat, nestled in a lush environment overlooking the river Dordogne. Quiet, modern and comfortable. Bedrooms and studios with private terrace with a view on the bastide village of Domme. Big park, outdoor heated swimming pool, panoramic terrace. Non smoking. LCD TV, children play area.
fr:
Situation privilégiée au cœur du Périgord Noir, l'hôtel le Clos du Roussillon est à 5 minutes de Sarlat, Domme et La Roque Gageac. N’hésitez plus et venez profiter d’un havre de paix et de tranquillité pour un séjour inoubliable. Cadre verdoyant et vue panoramique sur la bastide de Domme. 
Hôtel au calme, moderne et accueillant, idéal pour le repos. Chambres et studios climatisés, certains avec terrasse privative et kitchenette.
Très belle piscine extérieure chauffée, grand parc ombragé, terrasse panoramique, bar et parking privé gratuit.
